question.title: How can I run a local application using JavaFx on intellij?
question.body:
/Users/ashwin/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/openjdk-22.0.1/Contents/Home/bin/java --module-path ~/Downloads/javafx-sdk-17.0.11/lib. --add-modules javafx.controls,javafx.fxml -Djava.library.path=~/Downloads/javafx-sdk-17.0.11/lib. -javaagent:/Applications/IntelliJ IDEA.app/Contents/lib/idea_rt.jar=49194:/Applications/IntelliJ IDEA.app/Contents/bin -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -Dsun.stdout.encoding=UTF-8 -Dsun.stderr.encoding=UTF-8 -classpath /Users/ashwin/Desktop/RPGenerator/Random Password Generator/out/production/Random Password Generator:/Users/ashwin/Downloads/javafx-sdk-17.0.11/lib/javafx-swt.jar:/Users/ashwin/Downloads/javafx-sdk-17.0.11/lib/javafx.web.jar:/Users/ashwin/Downloads/javafx-sdk-17.0.11/lib/javafx.base.jar:/Users/ashwin/Downloads/javafx-sdk-17.0.11/lib/javafx.fxml.jar:/Users/ashwin/Downloads/javafx-sdk-17.0.11/lib/javafx.media.jar:/Users/ashwin/Downloads/javafx-sdk-17.0.11/lib/javafx.swing.jar:/Users/ashwin/Downloads/javafx-sdk-17.0.11/lib/javafx.controls.jar:/Users/ashwin/Downloads/javafx-sdk-17.0.11/lib/javafx.graphics.jar PasswordApp
Error occurred during initialization of boot layer
java.lang.module.FindException: Module javafx.controls not found

Process finished with exit code 1

This is the error I get when trying to run a local app. I am using OpenJDK-22.

I have tried JavaFx version 22 and 17. I keep getting the error that javafx.controls not found, even though it is in the lib. directory.
